name: galactic.capital.investment
shortDescription: Implements a short mission chain that enables repeatable job board investment opportunities which result in small daily income. Available in human, quarg and hai space.
description: Implements a short mission chain that enables repeatable job board investment opportunities which result in small daily income. Available in human, quarg and hai space starting with 2 million credits cash and going up to 1000 million credits. See the readme for details.
